name: Lone Space (Masonzk)
description:
Lone Space is an arcade shooter that has you playing as a lone spaceship. Shoot and kill enemies to make it through the waves! Enemies drop power ups that can be used to upgrade your ship, but you can only hold one at a time. 

POWER UP INFO:

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

RED POWER UP:

Gives you 1 free health at the end of every wave.

YELLOW POWER UP:

Makes you faster.

GREEN POWER UP:

Makes your bullets bigger.

KNOW BUGS:

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  • Pressing the restart button after losing the game can sometimes break everything. Just reload your browser and you should be fine.
